mil3.4.7:0.3: Question on the Bearing Up of the Earth
mil3.4.7:1.3: this great earth is established on water, water is established on air, and air is established on space. I do not believe this assertion.”
mil3.4.7:1.4: The elder took some water in a water vessel and explained to King Milinda,
mil3.4.7:1.5: “Just as, your majesty, this water is supported by the air, so too is that water supported by air.”
mil3.4.7:3.1: Question on the Bearing Up of the Earth seventh
